segments.text: what sort of music do you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I love just about anything by Prince .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , I like all kinds of music , but he is one of my favorites . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you have a favorite band ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: to be honest , no . I'm always in search of new music to listen to .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: do you often go to concerts ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I usually go to see a live band about twice a month . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I love going to live gigs . Are there any good local bands playing around here that you'd recommend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: there's an open mic night at the pub down the road every Thursday night where my favorite local band usually plays . You should come along next week with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd love to , but I have a night class on Thursdays .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's too bad . Maybe another time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: let me know if you hear about any good bands playing on the weekends . I have more free time then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll let you know . Did you want to watch some TV ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: there's a reality TV show about a group of people who are trying to lose weight .
segments.speaker: S1
